J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

>> The test runner engine would need to "sort" the calling order be
>> dependency tree, and would need to know when not to call something,
>> perhaps introducing a new state ("deferred" -- meaning not run due
>> to a dependency failure/error -- to add to "fail", "error".)
> 
> The sorting part is not easy.

Perhaps you could let Werkz <http://werkz.sourceforge.net/> do the work.
Running the high level tests would be a goal depending on the
successfull run of the lower level tests, so it seems to me. OTOH it
might also be overkill...

Regards, Ilja
